name: @techspokes/typescript-wsdl-client
description: TypeScript WSDL â†’ SOAP client generator with full xs:attribute support, complex types, sequences, inheritance, and namespace-collision merging.
author: TechSpokes <contact@techspokes.com> (https://www.techspokes.com)

scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run smoke:pipeline
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.smoke:compile: npm run smoke:reset && tsx src/cli.ts compile --wsdl-source examples/minimal/weather.wsdl --catalog-file tmp/catalog.json
scripts.smoke:client: npm run smoke:reset && tsx src/cli.ts client --wsdl-source examples/minimal/weather.wsdl --client-dir tmp/client && tsc -p tsconfig.smoke.json
scripts.smoke:openapi: npm run smoke:reset && tsx src/cli.ts openapi --wsdl-source examples/minimal/weather.wsdl --openapi-file tmp/openapi.json --openapi-format json && tsc -p tsconfig.smoke.json
scripts.smoke:gateway: npm run smoke:reset && tsx src/cli.ts client --wsdl-source examples/minimal/weather.wsdl --client-dir tmp/client && tsx src/cli.ts openapi --catalog-file tmp/client/catalog.json --openapi-file tmp/openapi.json --openapi-format json && tsx src/cli.ts gateway --openapi-file tmp/openapi.json --client-dir tmp/client --gateway-dir tmp/gateway --gateway-service-name weather --gateway-version-prefix v1 && tsc -p tsconfig.smoke.json
scripts.smoke:pipeline: npm run smoke:reset && tsx src/cli.ts pipeline --wsdl-source examples/minimal/weather.wsdl --client-dir tmp/client --openapi-file tmp/openapi.json --gateway-dir tmp/gateway --gateway-service-name weather --gateway-version-prefix v1 --openapi-format json --openapi-servers https://example.com/api --generate-app && tsc -p tsconfig.smoke.json
scripts.smoke:app: npm run smoke:reset && tsx src/cli.ts pipeline --wsdl-source examples/minimal/weather.wsdl --client-dir tmp/client --openapi-file tmp/openapi.json --gateway-dir tmp/gateway --gateway-service-name weather --gateway-version-prefix v1 --openapi-format json --openapi-servers https://example.com/api && tsx src/cli.ts app --client-dir tmp/client --gateway-dir tmp/gateway --openapi-file tmp/openapi.json --app-dir tmp/app && tsc -p tsconfig.smoke.json
scripts.ci: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run typecheck && npm run smoke:pipeline
